text: Can you help me set an alarm for 8:30 AM on March 25th, 2023?
Sure, I can do that. May I know your token for authorization?
No worries, I can get that for you. May I know your login information, please?
My username is "admin" and the password is "adminpass".
Thanks. I have obtained your token. What's the time you want me to set the alarm for?
Please set the alarm for 8:30 AM on March 25th, 2023.
Done. The alarm has been set for that time.
